@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat:400,600&amp;display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Sans:400,400i,700,700i&amp;display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:400,700&amp;display=swap');
.section-header {
  font-size: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin: 30px auto 30px;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
}
.noise-gif {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  opacity: .17;
  background-image: url('../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/callofduty/cod-touchui/kronos/home/common/noise-gif-square-anim.gif');
  overflow: hidden;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 10;
}
@keyframes arrow {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translate(0, 0);
    -moz-transform: translate(0, 0);
    -ms-transform: translate(0, 0);
    -o-transform: translate(0, 0);
    transform: translate(0, 0);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  25% {
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-transform: translate(0, 2px);
    -moz-transform: translate(0, 2px);
    -ms-transform: translate(0, 2px);
    -o-transform: translate(0, 2px);
    transform: translate(0, 2px);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-transform: translate(0, 8px);
    -moz-transform: translate(0, 8px);
    -ms-transform: translate(0, 8px);
    -o-transform: translate(0, 8px);
    transform: translate(0, 8px);
  }
  75%,
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translate(0, 10px);
    -moz-transform: translate(0, 10px);
    -ms-transform: translate(0, 10px);
    -o-transform: translate(0, 10px);
    transform: translate(0, 10px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
.activision-footer {
  font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
  background-image: url('../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/footer/footer-bg.png'), radial-gradient(circle, #363636 0%, #000000 80%);
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  padding: 75px 0 25px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #fff;
  /* SECTION INITIAL */
  /* SECTION SECONDARY */
  /* SECTION TERTIARY */
  /* SECTION QUARTERNARY */
}
.activision-footer h3 {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin: 0 0 20px;
  color: #fff;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: left;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .activision-footer h3 {
    text-align: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .activision-footer-wrapper {
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 1300px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.activision-footer .footer-section-initial {
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-flex-direction: column;
  -ms-flex-direction: column;
  flex-direction: column;
  display: none;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 50px;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-section-initial {
    display: flex;
  }
  .activision-footer .footer-section-initial h3 {
    text-align: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-locale-container {
  position: relative;
  display: -moz-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: -webkit-flex;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
  -ms-flex-pack: center;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
  -webkit-align-items: center;
  -ms-flex-align: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}
.activision-footer .atvi-locale-selector {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, 0);
  padding: 7px 11px;
  background-color: #141414;
  z-index: 9999;
}
.activision-footer .atvi-locale-selector .locale-link,
.activision-footer .atvi-locale-selector a {
  color: #000;
}
.activision-footer .atvi-locale-selector .close-button {
  color: #fff;
}
.activision-footer .footer-section-secondary {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-section-secondary {
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-links-container {
  margin-bottom: 50px;
}
.activision-footer .footer-links-list {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
  text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.8;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-links-list {
    text-align: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-ext-link {
  position: relative;
  padding-right: 20px;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #fff;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ext-link.footer-ext-link-disabled {
  padding-right: 0px;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ext-link.footer-ext-link-disabled::after {
  display: none;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ext-link::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  right: 0;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
  background-position: center center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  height: 11px;
  width: 11px;
}
.activision-footer .footer-section-tertiary {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-section-tertiary {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  .activision-footer .footer-section-tertiary .footer-socialmedia-container {
    display: none;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia-container {
  display: block;
  text-align: left;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-socialmedia-container {
    text-align: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-socialmedia-list {
    justify-content: center;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia {
  width: 38px;
  height: 38px;
  background-color: blue;
  display: block;
  text-decoration: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-indent: 100%;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: 10px;
  background-position: center center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia.footer-socialmedia-fb {
  background-image: url(../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/fb-icon.png);
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia.footer-socialmedia-tw {
  background-image: url(../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/tw-icon.png);
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia.footer-socialmedia-yt {
  background-image: url(../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/yt-icon.png);
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia.footer-socialmedia-li {
  background-image: url(../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/in-icon.png);
}
.activision-footer .footer-socialmedia.footer-socialmedia-ig {
  background-image: url(../../../../../../../content/dam/atvi/activision/atvi-touchui/activision/common/ig-icon.png);
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-socialmedia {
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-right: 5px;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-ratings-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  align-items: center;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-ratings-container {
    justify-content: center;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-ratings-icon {
  width: 40px;
  height: 75px;
  display: block;
  text-decoration: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-indent: 100%;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: contain;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  margin-left: 10px;
  margin-right: auto;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ratings-icon.esrb-rating {
  width: 100px;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ratings-icon.esrb-cert {
  width: 50px;
}
.activision-footer .footer-ratings-icon.esrb-bbb {
  width: 45px;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-ratings-icon {
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-right: 5px;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .activision-footer .footer-section-quaternary .footer-locale-container {
    display: none;
  }
}
.activision-footer .footer-brand-container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
}
.activision-footer .footer-logo {
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: contain;
  width: 150px;
  height: 45px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.activision-footer li.locale-entry.loc-pl.PL {
  display: none;
}
html[lang='ar'] .activision-footer .footer-ext-link {
  padding-right: 0;
  padding-left: 20px;
}
html[lang='ar'] .activision-footer .footer-ext-link:after {
  right: auto;
  left: 0;
}
